General
Open command palette⌘ K
Show Keyboard shortcuts?
Open Activity Feedo then a
Toggle fullscreen modef
Navigation
Go to Homeg then d
Go to Storiesg then s
Go to Epicsg then e
Go to Iterationsg then i
Go to Backlogg then b
Go to Labelsg then l
Go to Objectivesg then o
Go to Reportsg then r
Go to advanced story searchg then space
Stories Page
Open Story Template menut
Move a Story to the top of the list⌘ ⇧ ↑
Move a Story to the bottom of the list⌘ ⇧ ↓
Select "Title only" Story density viewd then 1
Select "Minimal" Story density viewd then 2
Select "Standard" Story density viewd then 3
Select "Jumbo" Story density viewd then 4
Stories Dialog
Add/remove yourself as an owner of the current Storyi
Follow/unfollow the current Storyf
Change state⇧ s
Change iteration⇧ i
Change estimate⇧ e
Copy branch name⌘ ⇧ ,
Copy branch name and move to Started⌘ ⇧ .
Save a Story description or comment⌘ ↵
Archive Story⇧ a
Delete Story (that was already archived)⇧ d
Epic View
Add new Story in current Epicn
Save changes⌘ ↵
